overview.title: Overview
paragraphs: MazayaGo is a platform for running and managing contests, offers, and interactive experiences across the web and multiple channels.
The pages below explain how we handle data, the rules for participation, and how to contact us for privacy or compliance requests.
overview.calloutBody: Use the links below when sharing policy URLs with partners or Meta App Review.

meta.title: Policy URLs for verification
paragraphs: For app review or partner verification (including Meta), use the canonical URLs below. Each page is publicly accessible without authentication.
If you manage multiple Pages or channels, these policies apply to all MazayaGo-managed flows.

support.title: Support and compliance contact
paragraphs: If you have questions about privacy, data deletion, or policy interpretation, reach our compliance team.
We respond to verified requests as quickly as possible and may request additional information to confirm identity.

PoliciesPrivacy.title: Privacy Policy
PoliciesPrivacy.description: How MazayaGo collects, uses, and protects data across the platform.
PoliciesPrivacy.subtitle: Applies to our website, contests, and connected channels.
PoliciesPrivacy.footerNote: Using MazayaGo means you agree to this policy. If you do not agree, please stop using the service.

scope.title: Scope
paragraphs: This Privacy Policy explains how MazayaGo collects and processes information when you use our website, participate in contests, or interact with connected channels.
MazayaGo operates the platform and processes data within it; campaign sponsors define campaign rules but do not have direct access to our databases.

collection.title: Information we collect
paragraphs: We collect only the data needed to operate contests, provide support, and secure the platform.
Depending on the channel, this may include:
items: Messaging interaction data such as page-scoped identifiers, channel identifiers, message payloads, answers, and timestamps needed to operate campaigns.
Website account details such as email or phone number if you choose to register.
Contest participation details like entries, choices, and reward status.
Technical logs such as IP address and user-agent for security and fraud prevention.
Optional information you provide in support requests.

sources.title: Sources of data
paragraphs: We receive information directly from you, from your interactions with our website and connected channels, and from clients who manage campaigns on MazayaGo.
We do not collect public profile data unless you provide it or it is required to fulfill a contest you joined.

usage.title: How we use data
items: Operate contest and offer flows, including eligibility checks and winner selection.
Provide customer support and respond to policy requests.
Prevent fraud, abuse, and security incidents.
Measure performance using aggregated analytics.
Comply with legal obligations.
Process data based on your consent, contractual necessity, or legitimate interests where applicable.

sharing.title: Sharing and disclosure
paragraphs: We do not sell personal data and do not share it for advertising or unrelated purposes.
Access to data is restricted to authorized MazayaGo personnel under strict security controls.
items: No sale, rental, or commercial distribution of personal data.
No third-party access to raw data or user profiles.
Data is used only to operate MazayaGo services and respond to your requests.
sharing.note: We do not use personal data for third-party advertising.

retention.title: Retention
paragraphs: We keep data only as long as needed for the contest, legal, and security purposes.
Typical retention periods are:
items: Contest and participation data: up to 12 months after the campaign ends.
Security and access logs: up to 90 days.
Support communications: as long as needed to resolve the request.
retention.note: Retention may be extended when required by law or shortened based on client instructions.

rights.title: Your rights
paragraphs: You can request access, correction, or deletion of your data.
We may ask for additional details to verify your request and protect participants.
items: Access: obtain a copy of relevant data.
Correction: fix inaccurate or incomplete data.
Deletion: request removal where applicable.
Restriction or objection: limit processing in certain cases.

security.title: Security measures
items: Encryption at rest for tokens and sensitive secrets.
Role-based access controls and least-privilege access.
Monitoring, logging, and incident response procedures.
Regular reviews of integrations and permissions.

children.title: Children and minors
paragraphs: MazayaGo is not directed to children under 13 and we do not knowingly collect their data.
If you believe a child has provided information, contact us to delete it.

updates.title: Updates to this policy
paragraphs: We may update this policy to reflect changes in our services or legal requirements.
The last updated date reflects the most recent revision.
MazayaGo may connect with external platforms to deliver campaigns (for example, messaging apps or social networks).
When you choose to interact through an external channel, your messages and channel identifiers are processed on that platform under its own policies.
For Meta Messenger, this may include PSID (page-scoped), message content, and contest links needed to run the flow and handle deletion requests.

PoliciesTerms.description: Rules for using MazayaGo and participating in contests and offers.
PoliciesTerms.subtitle: Please read carefully before using the platform.
PoliciesTerms.footerNote: These terms apply to all users and participants unless a specific campaign includes additional rules.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of terms
paragraphs: By accessing MazayaGo or participating in a contest, you agree to these Terms and our Privacy Policy.
If you do not agree, do not use the platform.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
items: You must meet the legal age and eligibility requirements in your country.
Minimum age may vary by campaign (for example 13+ or 18+), as required by local law.
Employees, contractors, or immediate family of a campaign sponsor may be excluded.
We may require verification before awarding prizes.

account.title: Accounts and accuracy
paragraphs: Creating an account is optional for some experiences; if you create one, provide accurate information.
You are responsible for safeguarding your credentials and activity under your account.

acceptable.title: Acceptable use
items: Do not use MazayaGo to submit false entries, automate participation, or manipulate outcomes.
Do not attempt to access systems or data you are not authorized to access.
Respect intellectual property and community standards.
Do not upload unlawful, harmful, or abusive content.

contests.title: Contest rules
paragraphs: Each contest may include specific rules, deadlines, and eligibility criteria.
We reserve the right to disqualify entries that violate rules or show fraud.
Decisions on winners are final, subject to verification.

prizes.title: Prizes
items: Prizes are provided as described and may be substituted when necessary.
We are not responsible for delays caused by third parties or shipping.

PoliciesDeletion.title: Data Deletion Instructions
PoliciesDeletion.description: How to request deletion of data associated with MazayaGo across web and connected channels.
PoliciesDeletion.subtitle: Use the form below or email our compliance team.
PoliciesDeletion.footerNote: Deletion requests are processed in accordance with legal obligations and campaign requirements.

overview.title: Overview
paragraphs: MazayaGo supports data deletion requests for our website, contests, and connected channels.
You can request deletion of Messenger data, website data, or both.
overview.calloutBody: We only collect the minimum identifiers needed to locate your data.

covered.title: What data can be deleted
items: Contest participation records, entries, and responses.
Messaging conversation metadata and answers stored for campaign operation.
Website account details if you created an account.
Data from connected channels used to run campaigns, when applicable.
Support communications related to the request.

identifiers.title: Identifiers we use
paragraphs: To locate your records, we need at least one identifier such as a conversation or channel reference, contest URL, or Page/channel name or ID.
If you do not have a conversation reference or PSID, use the contest link or Page/channel name; email (if available) can also help us locate your request.
items: Conversation or session reference (such as Messenger MT or another channel ID).
Page or channel name or ID.
Campaign or contest URL.
PSID for Meta Messenger users only (if available).
identifiers.noteBody: Some platforms provide special identifiers (such as PSID in Meta Messenger) and they may not be visible to users. Use the contest link or channel name if you do not have them.

verification.title: Verification
paragraphs: To protect participants, we may ask for additional details to confirm ownership.
Requests without sufficient information may be delayed or rejected.

timeline.title: Processing timeline
paragraphs: We aim to respond within 30 days, and sooner for most requests.
Complex requests or legal holds may require more time.

outcomes.title: Possible outcomes
paragraphs: We will confirm deletion or provide a reason if some data must be retained.
Where legally required, we may keep limited records for fraud prevention or compliance.

limitations.title: Limitations
items: We cannot delete data needed to comply with law, resolve disputes, or enforce our terms.
Backups or legal holds may require limited retention for security and compliance.
Some aggregated analytics may be retained as they do not identify individuals.
Deletion from third-party systems depends on their policies.
